channel.title: Papers Under Review on Tiago Ventura
channel.description: Recent content in Papers Under Review on Tiago Ventura

item.title: Trustful Voters, Trustworthy Politicians: A Survey Experiment on the Influence of Social Mediain Politics
The Effect of Streaming Chat on Perceptions of Debates
Winning! Adjudication and Dialogue in Social Media
item.description: This article introduces the concept of adjudication to define the act of granting or denying ownership of an outcome to individuals or groups in social media. We extend existing models of political dialogue to explain differences between winners and losers when elections are adjudicated.

item.title: News by popular demand: Ideology, Reputation, and Issue Attention in Social Media News Sharing
